categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The skirmish at the Krake Data Vault took place in 3 ABY on Krake's Planet between elements of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the forces of the Galactic Empire. Luke Skywalker infiltrated the Imperial Krake Data Vault and secured secret background information on Shira Brie, revelaing her to be an undercover Imperial spy.
